amendatorysection.catchline: Electronic certificate of title; changes authorized.
amendatorysection.para: Beginning January 1, 2019, if a motorboat certificate of title is an electronic certificate of title record, upon application by an owner or a lienholder and payment of the fee prescribed in section 37-1287, the following changes may be made to a certificate of title electronically and without printing a certificate of title:
(1) Changing the name of an owner to reflect a legal change of name;
(2) Removing the name of an owner with the consent of all owners and lienholders; or
(3) Adding an additional owner with the consent of all owners and lienholders.
